original_text: When Ahab heard Elijah's message, he tore his clothes into pieces. He dressed himself in sackcloth and he did not eat any food. He even wore sackcloth when he slept on his bed. He walked slowly with a sad face.
korean_text: 아합이 이 모든 말씀을 들을 때에 그의 옷을 찢고 굵은 베로 몸을 동이고 금식하고 굵은 베에 누우며 또 풀이 죽어 다니더라

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 어떤 음식도 먹지 않았다

sentences.original_text: He even wore sackcloth when he slept on his bed
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 침대에서 잘 때도 굵은 베옷을 입었다
